    pfs="Standard"
>
[Oil of Revelation](/Equipment.aspx?ID=717)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Oil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=121" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 258 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This bright oil, first created by humans as a tool to help them fight in darkness, holds flecks of tiny gemstones in suspension and smells like a struck [tindertwig](/Equipment.aspx?ID=138).

 The first time a weapon coated with this oil damages a creature, the wound glows with light for 1 minute. If the creature is [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26), the light's position means it is merely [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) to creatures that would otherwise be unable to see it, rather than [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39). The light also negates the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition due to lighting conditions. If the coated weapon doesn't damage a creature within 1 hour, the oil sloughs off and loses its power.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
